channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Seeking metaphor
item.description: This is how we learn. An apple is a lot like an orange, but you can eat the skin and it’s not as sweet. If you know what an orange is, you’re most of ...

item.title: A Staggering Number Of Teens Personally Know Someone Targeted By Deepfake Nudes
item.description: A new survey from nonprofit Thorn shows the growing threat of AI-generated explicit images of American kids.

item.title: The lonely unicorn

item.title: Pharmaceutical Tariffs Likely Raise Prices, But Would They Lead To Reshoring?
item.description: Despite the potential for price hikes, Trump asserts that imposing pharmaceutical tariffs will lead to reshoring. But this tends to be hard to achieve...

item.title: Key Technologies Shaping The Future Of Fintech
item.description: The use of technology to innovate new services, businesses and opportunities is redefining the finance industry.

item.title: New Data Shows Just How Badly OpenAI And Perplexity Are Screwing Over Publishers
item.description: AI companies promised publishers their AI search engines would send them more readers via referral traffic. New data shows that’s not the case.
